Data Fields
_NV_TIMING Struct Reference
Display Control Interface

#include <nvapi.h>

Data Fields

NvU16 HVisible
NvU16 HBorder
NvU16 HFrontPorch
NvU16 HSyncWidth
NvU16 HTotal
NvU8 HSyncPol
NvU16 VVisible
NvU16 VBorder
NvU16 VFrontPorch
NvU16 VSyncWidth
NvU16 VTotal
NvU8 VSyncPol
NvU16 interlaced
NvU32 pclk
NV_TIMINGEXT etc

Detailed Description

The very basic timing structure based on the VESA standard: 

            |<----------------------------htotal--------------------------->| 
             ---------"active" video-------->|<-------blanking------>|<-----  
            |<-------hvisible-------->|<-hb->|<-hfp->|<-hsw->|<-hbp->|<-hb->| 
 --------- -+-------------------------+      |       |       |       |      | 
   A      A |                         |      |       |       |       |      | 
   :      : |                         |      |       |       |       |      | 
   :      : |                         |      |       |       |       |      | 
   :vertical|    addressable video    |      |       |       |       |      | 
   : visible|                         |      |       |       |       |      | 
   :      : |                         |      |       |       |       |      | 
   :      : |                         |      |       |       |       |      | 
 vertical V |                         |      |       |       |       |      | 
  total   --+-------------------------+      |       |       |       |      | 
   :      vb         border                  |       |       |       |      | 
   :      -----------------------------------+       |       |       |      |  
   :      vfp        front porch                     |       |       |      |  
   :      -------------------------------------------+       |       |      | 
   :      vsw        sync width                              |       |      | 
   :      ---------------------------------------------------+       |      | 
   :      vbp        back porch                                      |      | 
   :      -----------------------------------------------------------+      | 
   V      vb         border                                                 | 
 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
